title: How to unsubscribe from Netflix
description: Here's how to cancel your Netflix subscription. After canceling, you can still use Netflix until the end of your current billing period. As of February 2026, Netflix monthly plan prices are: Standard with Ads: $7.99, Standard: $17.99, Premium: $24.99.

steps_1.title: Cancel Netflix Subscription via Web Browser
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Netflix subscription via a web browser, follow these steps:

*   Go to your Account page by going to netflix.com/account on a web browser.
*   Sign in if prompted.
*   Click the dropdown menu in the top right corner next to your profile name and click Account.
*   Click "Membership & Billing".
*   Click "Cancel Membership".
*   Click "Finish Cancellation" to confirm.

seo_text: Cancel Netflix subscription, unsubscribe from Netflix, Netflix billing, Netflix account cancellation
